channel.title: 317 SilabGarza || Bank Tabs || Perfect PKing || Skilling || Eco
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://sg-forum.com/images/bluefox/misc/logo.gif[/img]
SilGar Forums: [url=http://sg-forum.com/]SilabGarza - RuneScape Private Server[/url] Download Client: [url=http://play.sg-forum.com/info.html]Play SilabGarza - SilabGarza Client[/url] Play Webclient: [url=http://play.sg-forum.com/]SilabGarza - Webclient[/url] SG Wiki: [url=http://playsilab.com/wiki/]Main Page - SilabGarza Wiki[/url] Price Guide: [url=http://playsilab.com/ge/index.php]SilabGarza - Market[/url]
Why you should play SilabGarza:
There are thousands of rsps', why should you play SilGar?
Well, SilabGarza is currently one of the top RSPS servers and we've been up for over 5 years!
- Realistic PKing System - Over 5 locations to PK - The pure command for pure PKing - Daily Community Events - Many different Bosses to fight - Fully coded God Wars - Fully coded clan chat system - Many different minigames - Fully custom zombie survival minigame - Stable economy & market - A NPC gambler to double money - Active friendly community - Supportive staff members - Full screen client! - Many new items (SOL, Korasi, Chaotics, Barrelchest anchor, etc) - Fully working item effects - Bank tabs! - Curses such as soul split and turmoil - Vote shop with amazing items - Great skilling community - Choose between old hits and new hits - Donator zone and superzone (2x experience in superzone) - Regular bug fixes and updates!
Also, SilabGarza is ran on a powerful dedicated server: Intel Quad Core Xeon 3220 - 4 x 2.40GHz 2 x 500GB HDD 8GB RAM 1 GigE (1000Mbit) dedicated port
100% free of lag, for a smooth game play!
Pictures:
Active PKing [img]http://i.imgur.com/NUKSzkR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WBpvkD4.png[/img]
Quick Prayers + Resting (only server with resting glow) + Active Clans
[img]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/1764/b644c2f1208945a7aa0a4e4.png[/img]
Fully working curses!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/K3msM4Y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dQCNA1R.png[/img]
Skilling prestige for double and even triple experience!
[img]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/9158/7feb026486d041e18eaeb33.png[/img] [IMG]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/429/ea83177c483a4a9c817cff1.png[/img]
NPC gambler for 55x2!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OiHg19W.png[/img]
Custom teleports to many locations!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hcANbZ2.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sYS174n.png[/img]
Fully working bank tabs!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OjlqDEG.png[/img]
Item retrieving system!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0Ewa7h5.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/m8ROLaF.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vtrqmKj.png[/img]
We will see you there![/CENTER]

item.title: 317 SilabGarza || Bank Tabs || Perfect PKing || Skilling || Eco
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“jailable, post:8, topic:528295”][quote author=kingman002 link=topic=647041.msg4354431#msg4354431 date=1377220468]

no it has not reset, tempting to remove old character files tho

oh. i haven’t been on in over a year. if i can remember my username, is it possible to recover it? im pretty sure my username was something no one ever used

Edit: pretty sure i got my name back, no idea the password. username: 4410

pm me my pass?
[/quote]

You can easily fill out an account recovery on forums. You need to fill out your name, and some more information to determine whether the account is really yours.

Good luck![/quote]
cant he just compare ip’s of account on his forums to the account in game and see they match

Read full topic

item.title: 317 SilabGarza || Bank Tabs || Perfect PKing || Skilling || Eco
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

[CENTER]

SilGar Forums: SilabGarza - RuneScape Private Server
Download Client: Play SilabGarza - SilabGarza Client
Play Webclient: SilabGarza - Webclient
SG Wiki: Main Page - SilabGarza Wiki
Price Guide: SilabGarza - Market

Why you should play SilabGarza:

There are thousands of rsps’, why should you play SilGar?

Well, SilabGarza is currently one of the top RSPS servers and we’ve been up for over 5 years!

  • Realistic PKing System
  • Over 5 locations to PK
  • The pure command for pure PKing
  • Daily Community Events
  • Many different Bosses to fight
  • Fully coded God Wars
  • Fully coded clan chat system
  • Many different minigames
  • Fully custom zombie survival minigame
  • Stable economy & market
  • A NPC gambler to double money
  • Active friendly community
  • Supportive staff members
  • Full screen client!
  • Many new items (SOL, Korasi, Chaotics, Barrelchest anchor, etc)
  • Fully working item effects
  • Bank tabs!
  • Curses such as soul split and turmoil
  • Vote shop with amazing items
  • Great skilling community
  • Choose between old hits and new hits
  • Donator zone and superzone (2x experience in superzone)
  • Regular bug fixes and updates!

Also, SilabGarza is ran on a powerful dedicated server:
Intel Quad Core Xeon 3220 - 4 x 2.40GHz
2 x 500GB HDD
8GB RAM
1 GigE (1000Mbit) dedicated port

100% free of lag, for a smooth game play!

Pictures:

Active PKing

NUKSzkR.png834×625

WBpvkD4.png703×509

Quick Prayers + Resting (only server with resting glow) + Active Clans

Fully working curses!

K3msM4Y.png782×566

dQCNA1R.png780×565

Skilling prestige for double and even triple experience!


NPC gambler for 55x2!

OiHg19W.png779×567

Custom teleports to many locations!

Fully working bank tabs!

Item retrieving system!

We will see you there![/CENTER]
